title: Sunday AM Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
CHICAGO TYPEWRITER Episode 12: Back to Life

GO MONSTER GO Episode 8: It’s Coming From the Trunk

This marks the final episode of the first book of Chicago Typewriter. But thanks to the Arktoons subscribers, the story will continue, the second book is already being illustrated and the new episodes will appear on the site once they have been colored and lettered. In my opinion, the new art is even better; the image below is from the work-in-progress.
content_text:
CHICAGO TYPEWRITER Episode 12:
Back to Life
GO MONSTER GO Episode 8:
It’s Coming From the Trunk
This marks the final episode of the first book of
Chicago Typewriter
. But thanks to the Arktoons subscribers, the story will continue, the second book is already being illustrated and the new episodes will appear on the site once they have been colored and lettered. In my opinion, the new art is even better; the image below is from the work-in-progress.
